title: Constant FPS drops with GTX 1060 3GB
body:
Hello! My computer is suffering from rapid Fps drops in game it goes for 200fps at beginning and fluctuates between 50-65 fps with uncapped and borderless active. I think it may be bottle necking but i don't know! thanks in advance!   {{summoner:13}} 
Rig:
CPU: Fx6300
GPU: Gtx 1060 3gb

replies.body: Windowed mode will/may drop FPS as it's also rendering your desktop on the same screen. Background applications may hinder framerate at a CPU level. Running other games, sending them to the background, will also affect framerate.

There's a number of different things that could be going on to make your FPS spike like that, and we may just need to update some drivers here or there. Let's make sure to cover all of our bases by going through [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). Test those changes in a custom game, and hit me back if that doesn't smooth out those frames.
I tried all the steps none of them seem to help what so ever.

No worries, sometimes we need to try to narrow down what's really going on before we can start to fix it. Go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can do a lot more digging than I can here on the boards.
Had the same issue with a GTX 1080. Set cap to 60 FPS, turn off vsync.
